attributes.action: Hold a referendum on our withdrawal  from the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We initially Joined the European as a trade organization and nothing more. We have never been asked to align ourselves politically to Europe nor cede our democratic rights to Brussels We should be given the opportunity for a total withdrawal by referendum

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
